resources.string: This activity show current song. User can see title, artist, album and album cover. On the bottom of screen are buttons: backward, stop, pause/play and forward.
This activity show user playlist. User can add or remove songs, rearrange positions. User can manage playlists: add/remove.
When user click on the button, this Activity play random song from songs library. User can see: title, artist, album and album cover. User can click Next button to play next random song.
In this activity user can set library location and cover album server.
